body:
Thanks for the feedback! If your issue is related to the Flutter framework itself,
please open an issue at
[github.com/flutter/flutter](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/new).

Please file this bug report at https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/issues/new.

---

## Exception

null

```
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Wrong end: 3685; document length=1466; start=3681

	at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.LaterInvocator$FlushQueue.doRun(LaterInvocator.java:441)

	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:82)
```


## Steps to Reproduce

1) Created new flutter project
2) Run the project in Android Device
3) When I click the (+) icon from the new project (demo) I get this exception

comment_data.body:
Thanks for the report.

Looks like this is a dup of #3045

title: Exception in plugin Flutter (46.0.2) Android Studio
